item.title: About
item.description: Hi there This is Ryan (@derbalkon). The photo above was taken when I was in my third year at med school, and it’s called Modern and Broken, when the new building was just taking shape, next to the ruins. I took this photo simply out of the thought of documenting the mess, as with everything else in the world. About this blog This blog is built based on Hugo. The theme originates from jimmycar’s stack and barely touched anything.
